help.skip.content: - skip the 🎵music you are listening to
help.lang.content: - view a list of languages the bot can use
help.play.title: How to use '+play'
help.play.description:
1. +play <youtube url(live stream, playlist or just video)>
 2. +play <youtube search keyword>
help.delete.content: - deletes the song corresponding to the number you entered
help.loop.content: - repeat a song or an entire song, or turn repeat off
playlist.add: every song in the playlist is added
voice.playlist.title: List currently playing(loop : {})
language.title: Language list
language.description:
you should enter the code of each languages after '+language'
 1. korean
 2. english
 3. chinese
 4. japanese
delete.no.song: there is no song❌ in the playlist
no.permission: I have no permission❌ to enter the voice channel
enter.voice_channel: please order after entering the voice channel <@{}>
playlist.clear: Erasing all songs in the playlist
bot.not.voice.channel: the bot is not❌ in the voice channel
live.no.seek: time seek in live stream is not❌ available
this.channel: currently in the channel you entered
different.channel: you are in the different channel with bot
sorry.to.many.songs: we`re sorry for banning to add more than 10 songs in because it can cause some problems for operating bots successfully
download.error: Failed❌ to play youtube video. (Among the top 10 search result videos, age-limited videos and DRM-protected videos may be included. If the video you want is not related to this problem at all, I would appreciate it if you could help me search more accurately, including artists in the search keyword.)
